import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = () => { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { // Check if user is logged in const user = localStorage.getItem("user"); if (user) { try { const userData = JSON.parse(user); setIsLoggedIn(true); setUsername(userData.name || "User"); } catch (err) { console.error("Error parsing user data:", err); localStorage.removeItem("user"); // Clear invalid data } } }, []); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("user"); localStorage.removeItem("token"); localStorage.removeItem("foodCart"); setIsLoggedIn(false); navigate("/login"); }; const toggleMobileMenu = () => { setMobileMenuOpen(!mobileMenuOpen); }; return (
{/* Logo */} {/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Desktop Navigation Links */}
Home Stays Food Explore Contact
{/* Login/Register or User Profile - Desktop */}
{isLoggedIn ? (
Profile My Bookings My Orders
) : ( <> Login Register )}
{/* Mobile Menu */}
setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Home setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Stays setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Food setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Explore setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Contact
{isLoggedIn ? ( <>
Welcome, {username}
setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Profile setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > My Bookings setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > My Orders ) : (
setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Login setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Register
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
